inputs.description: A collection of arguments for invoking getSpotPrice.

availabilityZone.description: Availability zone in which to query Spot price information.

filters.description: One or more configuration blocks containing name-values filters. See the [EC2 API Reference](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AWSEC2/latest/APIReference/API_DescribeSpotPriceHistory.html) for supported filters. Detailed below.

instanceType.description: Type of instance for which to query Spot Price information.

outputs.description: A collection of values returned by getSpotPrice.

id.description: The provider-assigned unique ID for this managed resource.

spotPrice.description: Most recent Spot Price value for the given instance type and AZ.

spotPriceTimestamp.description: The timestamp at which the Spot Price value was published.
